name: Lexslide
description:
Lexslide is a game where you build words out of word bricks!

Start building a word by picking a suitable starting brick, hold W, and click to start building with it! Then extend the word by also clicking on other bricks.

You can click on a word that is blue or gold to score it. Mistakes cause you to start building a new word, but you will still get credit for what you were building, if it itself was a word.

Use both the top and the bottom of the screen to build two words at the same time! Hold S and click on bricks to send them to the bottom! Use this to your advantage to build as many words as you can in two minutes!

Coming soon to Android & iOS!
